vulnerability_location.description: Unchecked addition (pot += msg.value) and subtraction (pot - FEE_AMOUNT) in Solidity <0.8.0 can lead to integer overflow/underflow.
External calls via transfer (to bank and to msg.sender) can fail and revert the transaction, preventing execution and payouts
Random value generated using sha3(block.timestamp) which is predictable and manipulable by miners
Random number is derived solely from block.timestamp, allowing miner manipulation of the outcome.
Use of block.timestamp hashed via sha3 (now keccak256) to generate randomness is predictable/manipulable by miners
